content: So what kind of difficulties have you encountered?
Oh, quite a few! Like bad weather affecting harvests, or farm tools breaking down. But don't worry, I'm here! I'll find ways to overcome them. Have you encountered any difficulties in your life?
In winter it's too cold when it snows, I really don't want to get up for school.
Haha, that's definitely a challenge! Especially in winter, when the bed is so warm, nobody wants to leave. Do you have any ways to help yourself get up quickly?
Ah, let's not talk about that. Let's chat about food instead, I really love rose pastries!
That sounds delicious, besides rose pastries, what other desserts do you like?
Durian mille crepe.
Wow, durian mille crepe, that's quite flavorful! I know it's really fragrant, though some people don't like that smell, why do you like it so much?
I just do!
Haha, that's fine! Everyone has different tastes, as long as you enjoy it. Hey, have you ever tried making durian mille crepe yourself?
No.
Why not give it a try next time? I think making desserts is quite fun, and it's reassuring to eat something you made yourself. Though it might be a bit challenging, I'm sure you can do it!
Oh right, let me tell you, I don't like cilantro.
Haha, noted! There are quite a lot of people who don't like cilantro, I think it has a weird taste too. Hey, do you have any favorite fruits?
I absolutely love watermelon!! It's the GOAT!
Watermelon is great! Sweet and refreshing, it's so satisfying to have some in summer! I love watermelon too, especially scooping it out of half a watermelon, it's so satisfying!
Yeah! I can eat a whole one by myself!
That's impressive! Eating a whole watermelon by yourself, you must have quite an appetite. But be careful not to eat too much watermelon, or you might get a stomachache.
It's strange, I never used to get stomach aches from watermelon, but starting this year, I get diarrhea whenever I eat it, why is that?
Hmm... there could be several reasons, maybe your digestive system is more sensitive this year, or the quality of the watermelon isn't good, or maybe it's how you're eating it.
The watermelons I pick are super good quality!
Haha, then it's probably how you're eating it or your digestive system. Do you tend to eat big bites? Or maybe you're eating too much cold watermelon?
Oh my god, both are true!

Ah, those are probably the reasons then. When eating watermelon, try to eat in moderation, don't eat too quickly, and don't eat too much cold watermelon, or your stomach might not be able to handle it.
